title: BRIEF-Protein Science To Advance Through Leniobio And Dow Agrosciences License Agreement
text: March 15, 2018 / 12:40 PM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Protein Science To Advance Through Leniobio And Dow Agrosciences License Agreement Reuters Staff March 15 (Reuters) - DowDuPont Inc: * PROTEIN SCIENCE TO ADVANCE THROUGH LENIOBIO AND DOW AGROSCIENCES LICENSE AGREEMENT * LENIOBIO - EXCLUSIVE LICENSE TO ENABLE LENIOBIO TO UTILIZE DOW AGROSCIENCES’ PROPRIETARY EUKARYOTIC CELL-FREE PROTEIN EXPRESSION TECHNOLOGY​ * ‍LENIOBIO - WILL MARKET INNOVATION TO BIOPHARMACEUTICAL DEVELOPERS UNDER BRAND NAME ALICE​ * LENIOBIO - WILL LAUNCH ALICE PLATFORM IN 2018 INITIALLY AS AN EXPRESSION KIT THAT YIELDS HIGHER AMOUNTS OF PROTEINS ON AVERAGE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
